item.title: Oversharing
item.description: A common symptom of bipolar disorder during hypomanic or manic phases is oversharing. For me, this presents as a strong desire - a compulsion, really - to share my thoughts with others. For instance, I will share my current obsession or project with anyone who will listen, whether they asked about it or not, and generally I will not pay any attention to their response. I just need to blast out my thoughts to others.
